related_questions.question:
SMP NEGERI 1 PETASIA    ULANGAN SEMESTER : GENAP
MATA PELAJARAN
BAHASA INGGERIS
KELAS
VIII SELURUHNYA
TAHUN PELAJARAN 2020/2021
Erwin, I forget to buy newspapers for our English Conversatoin class
Tomorrow,
Can you buy them ? thanks
Alya
Answer the questions base on the message, no 1-3.
1 Who writes the message ?
2. What should Erwin buy?
3. When Alya going to use them?​

Essays    1. Give 2 examples how to offering help
2 What is "Narative Text"

3. Write 2 sentences using "should"
4. Name 2 examples of "Quantifiers"
5. Give 1 sentence of "Simple Past Tense"


​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. a. Would you like some help?

b. May i offer you some help?

2. A narrative text is a piece of text which tells a story which entertains the reader or listener.

3. a. Adam, I'm afraid that you should definitely see a dentist.

b. Robin, I think you should study more.

4. a. I saw few people in the program.

b. Liam has many friends here.

5. He wrote this masterpiece yesterday.

related_questions.question:
38. A part of songs which tells the story is called..    A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda

39. A part of songs which is also called as tail is.. 
A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda

40.A part songs which usually repeated in a song is... 
A. Chorus
B. Pre-chorus
C. Verse
D. Coda



Bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

38.C. Verse

Penjelasan=A verse is a repeated section of a song that typically features a new set of lyrics on each repetition. ... And while choruses typically contain a song's signature musical motif, the music of a verse is often written to complement the chorus music.

39.D. Coda

penjelasan=Coda is an Italian word for "tail," it is the additional lines of a song which brings it to a close. The coda is an optional addition to a song.

40.A. Chorus

penjelasan=When a distinction is made, the chorus is the part that contains the hook or the "main idea" of a song's lyrics and music, and there is rarely variation from one repetition of the chorus to the next

related_questions.question:
33. Rearrange these sentences into a good paragraph!    (1) Jack had an accident a few days ago
(2) Jill went to the Hospital to visit him
(3) He is still in the hospital now
(4) She is at hospital now
(5) He had to go to the hospital​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

(1),(5),(3),(2),(4)

Penjelasan:

1.jack mengalami kecelakaan beberapa hari yang lalu

2.jill pergi ke RS untuk mengunjunginya(laki laki)

4.dia(perempuan) di RS sekarang

aku bantu sebisa aku za

1. b

3. c

4. c

5. a
